attributes.action: The Treaty of Union 1707 is no longer fit for purpose and Dissolve The Union
attributes.background: Scotland and England have diversified in different directions. Brexit has shown that Scotland prefer an internationalist approach and that England seem to prefer a more insular future. Scotland has a social culture whereas the Englands is more conservative.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for the people of Scotland and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to sign this petition calling for a referendum on Scottish Independence instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235096
